name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
description: In Part 2 of the epic finale, the battle between the good and evil forces of the Wizarding World escalate into an all-out war. The stakes have never been higher and no one is safe. But it is Harry Potter who may be called upon to make the ultimate sacrifice as he draws closer to the climactic showdown with Lord Voldemort. It all ends here.
